PathOfBuilding.Notes:
IMPORTANT: Resistances are not on the items. There are sufficient Suffixes to handle all your Resistances, use them and look out for them while buying items. Do NOT forget Chaos Resistance as well, it's semi-mandatory nowadays to get at least 30+%. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- If you are having trouble with colours, like ^xE05030red^7 Sockets, drop some ^x70FF70Eva^7/^x7070FFES^7 gear for ^xE05030Armour^7 gear. Later, colours are easy and you should stick with ^x70FF70Eva^7/^x7070FFES^7 gear. -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
^xFFFF77Hexblast has some unique features: ^7
1) 100% more Damage while an enemy is cursed.
2) Hexblast also removes a curse whenever you hit with it, meaning you need to constantantly reapply your curse to keep up your damage.
3) In total you have 2 Curses and get them from 2 different sources:
1st Curse: ^xE05030^x7070FFFlammability^7^7 OR ^x7070FFFrostbite^7 2cnd Curse: ^x7070FFElemental Weakness^7
You get one Curse from a "Curse on Hit Ring" (Flammability, Frostbite or Elemental Weakness) Whatever second Curse you are missing, you apply with the ^xAF6025Unique Ring Profane Proxy^7 (right Ring Slot). Before you get that Ring, just apply the Curse manually at Bosses and don't bother with it while mapping, Curse on Hit alone will carry you for a long time.
4) "Chaos Damage with Hits is Resisted by lowest Resistance instead" This means you want to use ^x7070FFElemental Weakness^7 and then EITHER Frostbite OR Flammability to reduce a single element of your choosing, even though Hexblast is technically dealing ^xD02090Chaos Damage^7. You reduce Resistances further by applying Exposure to enemies. If you are using Frostbite, get ^x3F6DB3Cold Exposure^7 (Gloves), if you are using ^xE05030^x7070FFFlammability^7^7, get ^xB97123Fire Exposure^7 (Gloves, ^x7070FFWave of Conviction^7) !!! ^xE05030^xD02090YOU CANNOT USE ^x7070FFCONDUCTIVITY^7 BECAUSE IT RESETS ELEMENTAL WEAKNESS (DON'T ASK , DON'T USE) ^7^7!!!
5) Hexblast has a VERY low Critical Strike Chance of 4%. This means we have to increase our BASE Critical Strike Chance with:
-^x7070FF Increased Critical Strike Chance Support ^7until we get:
- ^xAF6025Sandstorm Visage Unique Helmet ^7
Once you have Sandstorm Visage, you can remove ^x7070FFCritical Strike Chance Support^7 for either ^x70FF70Trap and Mine Damage Support^7 or ^xE05030Empower Lvl 3/4^7 if you can afford it.
6) Hexblast's Damage can ^xB97123Ignite^7, ^xADAA47Shock^7 and ^x3F6DB3Freeze^7 even though it deals Chaos Damage. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Basics for Mines:
- You can have a maximum of 15 Mines, and increase that with things from the Passive Tree or Support Gems. - Mines reserve Mana while they are placed. The reservation is removed once the Mine explodes. - Mines have an Aura attached to them that buff other Mines around them, meaning the more Mines you place before Detonating, the more damage you will do in that "Mine Chain" once you press Detonate Mines. - On Stormblast and Pyroclast Mines, it's up to you wether you want an extra button or less damage, try out what feel better to you! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Leveling
- For Level 2-27, we're using Stormblast Mine + Orb of Storms as our main damage dealers. Throw down an Orb of Storms, and while inside it, cast Stormblast Mines for extra Damage. - During Leveling, prioritize getting Resistances and Life on your gear. - You might need some Attributes during Leveling, get those from your Amulet Implicit, or the crafting bench! (also Strength from Heavy Belt) - Your wand should have "Added Fire/Lightning/Cold Damage to Spells" and some "Spell Damage" (+to Gem Levels is great if you find it but not required) For a comprehensive Walkthrough, check out this video: [Link to Leveling Guide]
^xFFFF77^xC8C8C8Stormblast Mines^7^7 (Lvl 1-27):
^x7070FFStormblast Mines^7 (A1, Lvl 2) ^x70FF70Swift Assembly^7 (A1, Lvl 4) ^x7070FFAdded Lightning Damage ^xC8C8C8(A1, Lvl 8)^7^7
^x7070FFOrb of Storms (A1, Lvl 4) Added Lightning Damage (A1, Lvl 8) Controlled Destruction (A2, Lvl 18)
^x7070FFFlame Dash^7 (A1, Lvl 10)
^x7070FFSummon Skitterbots^7 (A2, Lvl 16) ^x70FF70^x7070FFHerald of Thunder^7 (A2, Lvl 16)
^x70FF70Bear Trap ^7(A1, Lvl 4)
---- ^x7070FF^xC8C8C8Pyroclast Mines^7^7 (lvl 28-x):
^x7070FFPyroclast Mines^7 (Lvl 28) ^x70FF70Swift Assembly^7 (swap this to Minefield once you feel comfortable with it, it's A LOT more damage) ^x7070FFCharged Mines^7 (from Fixture of Fate ^x7070FFElemental Focus^7
^xE05030Shield Charge^7 (from Fixture of Fate Quest in A3) ^x70FF70Faster Attacks^7 (Lvl 8) ^x70FF70Momentum Support^7 (Level 4)
^x7070FFSummon Skitterbots^7 (A2, Lvl 16) ^x70FF70Grace^7 (Lvl 24) (Try to fit this in over Herald of thunder ASAP, only if you have enough mana to reserve for your Mines though)
^x70FF70Bear Trap^7 (Lvl 4)
^x7070FFWave of Conviction^7 (Lvl 18)
---------------------------------- ^xADAA47TRANSITION TO HEXBLAST:^7
You can stay ^x7070FFPyroclast Mines^7 as long as you want, it's a strong skill and can clear everything in the game.
If you want to transition to ^x7070FFHexblast Mines^7 you need:
1) At least a 5-Link 2) A Curse on Hit Ring (^x7070FFFlammability^7, ^x7070FFFrostbite^7 or ^x7070FFElemental Weakness^7) On trade it's probably easiest to buy it, on SSF you can farm it from Fire and Cold nodes ("contains Fire/Cold Items) 3) A leveled ^x7070FFHexblast^7 (Lv 17+)
Some people say they don't like Hexblast Mines until they get Profane Proxy, in that case wait until you can afford it.https://pobb.in/7CeJoZ2UjxOk

Input.name: customMods
Input.string:
Suffixes on Items are open, fill them out with Resistances and Attributes as needed:
+200% to all elemental resistances +100% to chaos resistance +30 Dexterity +30 to Intelligence
